document_data.mainbody:
argin Jooli was one of the employees of Lady Jannaths Estate in the Lower City of Baldurs Gate in the late 15 century DR.
Jooli was a tan-skinned dwarvish man with dark brown curly hair and a bushy beard.
Circa the , Chamberlain Mercer, the man in charge of Lady Firelia Jannaths staff, dismissed all servants from the mansion on the mistresss orders. Mercer placed Jooli, who was assigned the job of the kitchen liaison, Furbleston, Bailey, Cyrilla, Phubbs, and Chef Marjoram on temporary leave with the pay of half-wages and allowance to seek temporary employment somewhere else. The chamberlain issued a statement that this dismissal was done at no imputation of malfeasance and would be ended upon notice.
Hargin was tasked with kitchen work, chopping up the produce for the manses chef. He was a somewhat unsavory man who was not against serving nobles "tainted" wine. It was rumored he was once a member of the Guild.
